text: Uye kana micherechedzo yedu iripachena ikaverengwa kwavari, vanoti: “Chii ichi kunze kwekuti murume (Muhammad (SAW)) anoda kukubvisai kubva kune izvo madzitateguru enyu ainamata.” Uye vanoti: “Iri (Qur’aan) hapana zviripo kunze kwemanyepo akafungwa.” Uye avo vasingatendi vanoti kana chokwadi chauya kwavari: “Hapana zviripo kunze kwemapipi ari pachena!”
